name: Ulisses Soares
title: How Can I Understand?
quote: When we earnestly, heartily, firmly, and sincerely seek to learn the gospel of Jesus Christ and teach it to one another, these teachings may transform hearts.

name: Becky Craven
title: Careful versus Casual
quote: As the influences of the world increasingly embrace the evil, we must strive with all diligence to stay firmly on the path that leads us safely to our Savior.

name: Brook P. Hales
title: Answers to Prayer
quote: The Father is aware of us, knows our needs, and will help us perfectly.

name: Dieter F. Uchtdorf
title: Missionary Work: Sharing What Is in Your Heart
quote: Wherever you are on this earth, there are plenty of opportunities to share the good news of the gospel of Jesus Christ.

name: W. Christopher Waddell
title: Just as He Did
quote: As we seek to minister just as He did, we will be provided opportunities to forget self and lift others.

name: Henry B. Eyring
title: A Home Where the Spirit of the Lord Dwells
quote: You will find some of your greatest joys in your efforts to make your home a place of faith in the Lord Jesus Christ and a place that is permeated with love.

name: M. Russell Ballard
title: The True, Pure, and Simple Gospel of Jesus Christ
quote: Loving God and loving our neighbors is the doctrinal foundation of ministering; home-centered, Church-supported learning; Sabbath-day spiritual worship; and the work of salvation.

name: Mathias Held
title: Seeking Knowledge by the Spirit
quote: We should learn to discern the truth not only through our rational minds but also through the very still and small voice of the Spirit.

name: Neil L. Andersen
title: The Eye of Faith
quote: If we pick and choose what we accept in the proclamation, we cloud our eternal view, putting too much importance on our experience here and now.

name: Takashi Wada
title: Feasting upon the Words of Christ
quote: Feasting upon the words of Christ can happen at any time and on any occasion if we prepare our hearts.

name: David P. Homer
title: Hearing His Voice
quote: In a world with so many competing voices, our Heavenly Father has made it possible for us to hear and follow His.

name: Jeffrey R. Holland
title: Behold the Lamb of God
quote: Our modified Sunday service is to emphasize the sacrament of the Lord’s Supper as the sacred, acknowledged focal point of our weekly worship experience.

name: Gary E. Stevenson
title: Your Priesthood Playbook
quote: Create your own playbook of how you will prove yourself as a disciple of Christ.

name: Carl B. Cook
title: The Quorum: A Place of Belonging
quote: The Lord would have you establish a strong quorum. As He gathers His children, they need a place to belong and grow.

name: Kim B. Clark
title: Look unto Jesus Christ
quote: If we look to Jesus Christ, He will help us live our covenants and magnify our calling as elders in Israel.

name: Henry B. Eyring
title: The Power of Sustaining Faith
quote: By raising your hand to sustain, you make a promise with God, whose servants these are, that you will sustain them.

name: Dallin H. Oaks
title: Where Will This Lead?
quote: We make better choices and decisions if we look at the alternatives and ponder where they will lead.

name: Russell M. Nelson
title: We Can Do Better and Be Better
quote: Make your focus on daily repentance so integral to your life that you can exercise the priesthood with greater power than ever before.

name: Dale G. Renlund
title: Abound with Blessings
quote: Most blessings that God desires to give us require action on our part—action based on our faith in Jesus Christ.

name: Sharon Eubank
title: Christ: The Light That Shines in Darkness
quote: If you feel that the beacon of your testimony is sputtering and darkness is closing in, take courage. Keep your promises to God.

name: Quentin L. Cook
title: Great Love for Our Father’s Children
quote: Love is the primary attribute and motive for the spiritual purposes we were charged to undertake by our beloved prophet.

name: D. Todd Christofferson
title: Preparing for the Lord’s Return
quote: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints is uniquely empowered and commissioned to accomplish the necessary preparations for the Lord’s Second Coming.

name: Tad R. Callister
title: The Atonement of Jesus Christ
quote: The Savior’s Atonement is not only infinite in scope but also individual in reach.

name: Russell M. Nelson
title: “Come, Follow Me”
quote: Jesus Christ invites us to take the covenant path back home to our Heavenly Parents and be with those we love.

name: Dallin H. Oaks
title: Cleansed by Repentance
quote: Because of God’s plan and the Atonement of Jesus Christ, we can be cleansed by the process of repentance.

name: Juan Pablo Villar
title: Exercising Our Spiritual Muscles
quote: Just as reading and learning about muscles is not enough to build muscle, reading and learning about faith without adding action is insufficient to build faith.

name: Gerrit W. Gong
title: Good Shepherd, Lamb of God
quote: Jesus Christ calls us in His voice and His name. He seeks and gathers us. He teaches us how to minister in love.

name: David A. Bednar
title: Prepared to Obtain Every Needful Thing
quote: Blessings will come as we strive to fulfill our individual responsibility to learn and love the restored gospel of Jesus Christ.

name: Kyle S. McKay
title: The Immediate Goodness of God
quote: Even while we are patiently waiting upon the Lord, there are certain blessings that come to us immediately.

name: Ronald A. Rasband
title: Build a Fortress of Spirituality and Protection
quote: When we live the gospel of Jesus Christ, when we draw upon the Savior’s Atonement and press forward with faith, we are fortified against the adversary.

name: Russell M. Nelson
title: Closing Remarks
quote: May we dedicate and rededicate our lives to serving God and His children—on both sides of the veil.
